meanings.definition: The state of being behind in payments or obligations.
meanings.sent1: He fell into arrearages on his rent after losing his job.
meanings.sent2: The company had to pay off their arrearages to avoid legal action.
meanings.sent3: The arrearages on his credit card bill were piling up like a mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her arrearages in returning library books were like a weight on her conscience.
meanings.sent5: The landlord's patience wore thin as the arrearages continued to grow.

meanings.definition: Unpaid or overdue debts or bills.
meanings.sent1: She struggled to keep up with her arrearages on the utility bills.
meanings.sent2: The arrearages on the loan were causing financial strain for the family.
meanings.sent3: His arrearages on the pizza delivery bill made the delivery guy raise an eyebrow.
meanings.sent4: The arrearages felt like a dark cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the arrearages only made the situation worse in the long run.
